sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Vladimir Putin claims Ukraine's counter-offensive has begun, as fighting intensifies in at least four areas of the front.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Four days after the destruction of Ukraine's Novokokhovka Dam, water levels are finally beginning to subside in the Kherson region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has gone on the counter-offensive in Bakhmut, the western Donetsk and southern

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Zaporizhia regions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Washington-based think tank the Institute for the Study of War says Kiev forces have continued ground attacks to varying degrees of success in at least four areas of the front.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In his nightly address on Friday, Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said they are І окремо для наших воїнів, для всіх, хто цими днями, в особливо важких боях, бачимо ваш героїзм.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: І ми вдячні вам за кожну хвилину вашого життя, життя, яке дійсно є життям України.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Російський президент Владимир Путін, на іншу сторону, каже експліцитно, що українська втрата на втрату почалася, згадуючи, що Київ втратився до цього часу.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Four days after the destruction of Ukraine's Novokokhovka Dam, water levels are finally beginning to subside in Kherson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian administration in the region says 35 settlements remain flooded, but the level has decreased half a meter in one day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: More than 6,000 people have been evacuated from dozens of inundated cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Residents of flooded areas have been told to sit on rooftops and wait to be rescued from their waterlogged houses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But that's a big risk to take, while missile attacks continue across the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The UN Humanitarian Office in Ukraine has decried the level of suffering by those affected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Its workers have delivered five additional truckloads of supplies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The flooding has ruined crops, displaced landmines, caused widespread environmental damage and set the stage for long-term electricity shortages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: One year after his departure from Downing Street, Boris Johnson has stepped down as an MP.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The former UK Prime Minister made the decision after learning he is to be sanctioned for misleading Parliament, ending any chance of returning to head a government before next year's general election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In a lengthy resignation statement, Johnson accused opponents of trying to drive him out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He called the committee investigating him a kangaroo court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: His career has seen a series of scandals and comebacks, but his freefall began with the Partygate scandal during the Covid-19 pandemic, which forced him out of Downing Street.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: With this move, the former Prime Minister heaps more political pressure on his successor, Rishi Sunak, as Johnson's local constituency will be up for election. The 58-year-old populist had held major offices including London Mayor, but also spent periods on the political sidelines before Britain's exit from the EU propelled him to the top.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Former US President Donald Trump has been charged on 37 counts for allegedly keeping hundreds of classified documents in his possession after leaving the White House.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The 49-page indictment was made public on Friday and accuses Trump of withholding information, hiding documents, conspiracy to obstruct justice and false testimony.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Justice Department special counsel says the former president is not above the law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We have one set of laws in this country and they apply to everyone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Applying those laws, collecting facts, that's what determines the outcome of an investigation. Nothing more and nothing less. Donald Trump, who is the current Republican frontrunner for 2024 presidential elections, denies any wrongdoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Colombian government and the largest remaining guerrilla group, the National Liberation Army,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: have signed a national bilateral and temporary ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is the main result of the third cycle of peace talks held in Cuba to resolve a conflict dating back to the 1960s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The ceasefire will take effect in phases and goes into full effect in August and is supposed to last 180 days.
